metadata.title: CVE-2024-36903 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: Fix potential uninit-value access in __ip6_make_skb()As it was done in commit fc1092f51567 ("ipv4: Fix uninit-value access in__ip_make_skb()") for IPv4, check FLOWI_FLAG_KNOWN_NH on fl6->flowi6_flagsinstead of testing HDRINCL on the socket to avoid a race condition whichcauses uninit-value access.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
